oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Knights Decline
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, Average Work Day, Other Unions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: Knights of Labor leader Terence Powderly with a sign encouraging workers to write essays on the 8-hour work day. Second Panel: Workers striking for an 8-hour day. Third Panel: Samuel Gompers speaking at the founding of the American Federation of Labor.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
